special_text:
Transcend [i](Activate as a sorcery to gain the next type and a +1/+1 counter.)[/i]
Flying
{1}{R}:  Wizard
Discard up to two cards. Draw a card and create a Treasure token for each card discarded this way.
{7}{U}: Scout
Shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. If thirty-nine or more cards or more were shuffled into your library this way, you may cast any number of cards in your hand without paying their mana costs.
